item.title: One error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @blue1phat blue1phat
item.description:
@blue1phat wrote:

i didnt understad a word of thats could u put it in words i could understand please…? so like i have to delete the server i have now and make a new one?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:22:45 PM[/size][hr]grr[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:36:34 PM[/size][hr]no matter what i do nothing works!!![br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:38:58 PM[/size][hr]gosh!please somone i cant take this i do not want to start a new servre and re code it[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:42:41 PM[/size][hr] [br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:44:28 PM[/size][hr]ok w/e im just gonna delete the sevre and remake it[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 10:47:06 PM[/size][hr]anyone got a last tip?
[center] Please do not double post/bump - the ‘Modify’ function exists for a reason[/center]

item.title: One error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

your destruct void is inside another public method and it is not allowed in there. Move it outside the other public method and say bye-bye to the error.

Read full topic
item.source: One error i need help with

item.title: One error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @blue1phat blue1phat
item.description:
@blue1phat wrote:

ok well i need help with one last error i have when i compile

the error is: Player.java:150 illegal start of expression
public void destruct()
^

what i have in player.java is

public void destruct()
{
	playerListSize = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < maxPlayerListSize; i++) playerList = null;
	npcListSize = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCListSize; i++) npcList = null;
}

all help is very appreciated

Read full topic
